unnormalised: Mumbai, India – As global supply chains remain volatile, accurate inventory forecasting has become crucial for Indian manufacturers looking to optimize operations and avoid costly disruptions. A recent study by IIM Bangalore, released on 10/11/2024, highlights the significant impact of predictive analytics on reducing inventory holding costs by up to 15% for companies implementing advanced forecasting models.
